pages.text: Bulldogs were originally bred for bull baiting.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these stocky dogs come in five coats.
Bulldogs are found most commonly in forests, flower forests, and sparse jungles. You can also find them in old growth birch forests and dark forests, and more rarely in regular birch forests.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Beef Treat.
